## Speaker
Xianfeng Jiang

### Theme
Cluster Algebras and Scattering Diagrams (1)

### Abstract
This lecture is an introductory guide to the theory of cluster algebras. We will focus on the basic notions, techniques, and key results concerning seeds, cluster patterns, and cluster algebras.
